Project Description

CardPlay is a C# framework for developing Solitaire card games. The solution includes a sample WPF client along with over 100 games.

A quick overview of the steps for creating new games can be found here.

External Dependencies

The framework uses Code Contracts.

Additionally, the sample client has the following dependencies:

  • Entity Framework
  • Reactive Extensions
  • Caliburn.Micro
  • WPF Toolkit

Future Development

  • Support for loading/saving games
  • Support for integrated playing instructions
  • Solvers and playing hints
  • Declarative-style game construction
  • Game publishing / downloadable plugins
